summary: During World War II, German ships are "safely" docked upriver at Bordeaux, but the British send a team of kayakers to attack them.
cast: José Ferrer|Trevor Howard|Dora Bryan|Christopher Lee|Victor Maddern|Anthony Newley|David Lodge|Peter Arne|Percy Herbert|Graham Stewart|John Fabian|John Van Eyssen|Robert Desmond|Walter Fitzgerald|Karel Stepanek|Beatrice Campbell|Sydney Tafler|Gladys Henson|Jacques B. Brunius|Andreas Malandrinos|Judith Furse|Patric Doonan|John Adams|Chris Adcock|Sheila Aza|John Blythe|Bill Brandon|Maurice Bush|Jess Conrad|Bill Cummings|Fred Haggerty|Aidan Harrington|Eric Henderson|Barry Johns|Sam Kydd|Mary Maxfield|Pat McGrath|Colin McKenzie|Antic Melkior|Fred Stroud|Yana
title: El infierno de los héroes
